title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 493.12 - The record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 493.12 - The record

State Regulations
(a) The record will include: (1)
all notices, pleadings and intermediate rulings; (2)
the transcript or recordings of the
hearing; (3)
exhibits received into
evidence; (4)
matters officially
noticed; and
(5)
the findings of
fact, conclusions of law and recommended decision of the hearing
officer. (b) After the
hearing has been concluded, the hearing officer must submit findings of fact, conclusions of law and a recommended decision to the commissioner or the
commissioner's designee. Findings of fact must be based exclusively on the
record of the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
493.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
